projects.title: Clone Of Smatbot
projects.description: SmatBot is a conversational bot building platform to create customizable chatbots for Lead generation, Live chat support, Interactive Landing Pages, Surveys, Enquiries, Appointments, Feedback and Suggestions for your business.
